$interpreted: Agitated Guest: I thought the manager's about to announce the competition? Where is she?
Impatient Guest: Me too! And I've still gotta rest up so I'm fresh and ready for it!!
Innkeeper's Representative: Ladies and gentlemen~ Thank you for your patience~~~
Innkeeper's Representative: Spring sakuras, bathing belles, a paradise beyond reckoning... The Spring Waters Hotel cordially welcomes you all!!
Nolva: Amazing! That's certainly roused everyone's spirits...
Innkeeper's Representative: Tomorrow will be our annual tradition—The Grand Hot Spring Contest!

Innkeeper's Representative: The rules are quite simple~ Whomsoever can stay longest in our onsen shall be crowned the winner! And don't forget, there are no rules against ejecting opponents in any manner whatsoever!
Nolva: Eh? N-no rules?
Excited Guest: I'm so pumped! Let's get this show on the road!
Innkeeper's Representative: To protect everyone's privacy, please wear appropriate clothing when you take the waters~
Innkeeper's Representative: Hold your horses, now~ This year's Grand Prize is sure not to disappoint!
Innkeeper's Representative: As always, Spring Waters will be offering plenty of generous cash prizes this year, too!
Innkeeper's Representative: ...And, finally—
Nolva: Ah! That's what Doctor Aster said would—

Innkeeper's Representative: —Said to have been used by the witch doctors to commune with the spirits and cure illness, a tonic capable of temporarily boosting your pep and pizzazz, it's... Imperial Flame Ginseng!
Innkeeper's Representative: Though this ginseng has always been offered as one of our prizes, this bunch here is the last remaining in our inventory!
Nolva: (...The last bunch!?)
Innkeeper's Representative: So, if any of our guests are up to the challenge... please step this way and line up to enter the competition!
Nolva: (...It's such a rare and valuable prize. Am I really capable of besting all the others and getting my hands on it...)
???: Are you all right?
Nolva: I-I'm fine~ Thanks for your concern... Huh?
Nolva: Are you from the Kingdom of the Sun too? Did you come all alone?
???: Yeah... I thought I'd just come for some sightseeing. But then I heard that the hotel was receiving entrants for the contest, so I just thought "What the heck!" and signed up.
Nolva: I see. I'm so happy to meet another guest from the West~
Nolva: I'm Nolva. May I ask your name?
Sione: Sione...
???: Yoohoo~ It's good to be back, this place is on the up!
Innkeeper's Representative: No, that couldn't be—
Innkeeper's Representative: The big cheese behind Spring Waters... Izumi!? Why didn't you say you were coming! I would have sent someone to receive you~
Izumi: This place belongs to me. Why go to the trouble? Besides~ I've come bearing gifts!
Izumi: We can't have this year's champion going home with just a little cash and some miserable herbs, can we~
Izumi: Let's up the ante...
Izumi: The winner will take over the management of the Spring Waters Hotel!
Innkeeper's Representative: Boss!? Don't joke around!! You wouldn't just give the hotel away to a stranger, would you!?
Izumi: It's my party, and I'll do as I want to~
Innkeeper's Representative: Waahh! But... I... You...
Izumi: I almost forgot... I've some other business to attend to while I'm back East. Well, I'll let you take it from here! I'll drop by to watch the fun if I have time~
Nolva: Gosh, what an... easygoing landlord, huh?
Sione: ...Yeah. But...
Sione: (What a twist we've stumbled upon—I wonder if the suspect will change up their MO accordingly...)
Nolva: Oh no, looks like the roster's nearly full already...!
Sione: Let's go.
Sione: What is it?
Nolva: Nothing, I thought I saw something...
Innkeeper's Representative: I've been working with Izumi for donkey's years. What the boss says, the boss does. Doesn't Izumi give a damn about us?! Blazes!
Little Bro: What about our little operation, Sis? Do you think the boss already...
Innkeeper's Representative: Hush your mouth! This is Izumi's first visit in a long time. We're all in this together, there's no chance of word getting out!
Big Bro: But the original plan was to use the contest as a smokescreen for our business. It'd be real dangerous to see it through now...
???: I agree. I've already conveyed our apologies to our distinguished guests.
Frail Young Lady: I've heard what's happening. They say Izumi's gonna hand over the management—so I'm throwing my name in the ring too.
Little Bro: Great idea! Big Sis 'n' Big Bro 'n' me all work here at the hotel already. But Izumi won't even recognize you. You can compete without the boss rumbling us~
Innkeeper's Representative: But she's always been so feeble. She doesn't stand a chance against those strapping young lads out there!
Frail Young Lady: Who says I'm gonna fight fair... Have you forgotten? I'm the brains behind our star product, spring dust!
Frail Young Lady: Since anything goes in this competition... I'm sure Izumi wouldn't object if I claimed victory with the help of a little medicine...
Frail Young Lady: As long as we're not found out, we can get up to whatever shady business we like here at the hotel.
Big Guy: Well... That really is the only way we're gonna be able to keep the hotel in our hands.
Frail Young Lady: So, we'd better all stick together. Action stations!
Frail Young Lady: We've got to win this thing, or we'll all be out of a job!

Model.Text: I thought the manager's about to announce the competition? Where is she?
Me too! And I've still gotta rest up so I'm fresh and ready for it!!
Ladies and gentlemen~ Thank you for your patience~~~
Spring sakuras, bathing belles, a paradise beyond reckoning... The Spring Waters Hotel cordially welcomes you all!!
Amazing! That's certainly roused everyone's spirits...
Tomorrow will be our annual tradition—The Grand Hot Spring Contest!
The rules are quite simple~ Whomsoever can stay longest in our onsen shall be crowned the winner! And don't forget, there are no rules against ejecting opponents in any manner whatsoever!

...And, finally—

Though this ginseng has always been offered as one of our prizes, this bunch here is the last remaining in our inventory!

So, if any of our guests are up to the challenge... please step this way and line up to enter the competition!
(...It's such a rare and valuable prize. Am I really capable of besting all the others and getting my hands on it...)

I-I'm fine~ Thanks for your concern... Huh?

Yeah... I thought I'd just come for some sightseeing. But then I heard that the hotel was receiving entrants for the contest, so I just thought "What the heck!" and signed up.
I see. I'm so happy to meet another guest from the West~
I'm Nolva. May I ask your name?
Sione...
Yoohoo~ It's good to be back, this place is on the up!
No, that couldn't be—
The big cheese behind Spring Waters... Izumi!? Why didn't you say you were coming! I would have sent someone to receive you~
This place belongs to me. Why go to the trouble? Besides~ I've come bearing gifts!
We can't have this year's champion going home with just a little cash and some miserable herbs, can we~
Let's up the ante...
The winner will take over the management of the Spring Waters Hotel!
Boss!? Don't joke around!! You wouldn't just give the hotel away to a stranger, would you!?
It's my party, and I'll do as I want to~
Waahh! But... I... You...
I almost forgot... I've some other business to attend to while I'm back East. Well, I'll let you take it from here! I'll drop by to watch the fun if I have time~
Gosh, what an... easygoing landlord, huh?
...Yeah. But...
(What a twist we've stumbled upon—I wonder if the suspect will change up their MO accordingly...)
Oh no, looks like the roster's nearly full already...!
Let's go.
What is it?
Nothing, I thought I saw something...
I've been working with Izumi for donkey's years. What the boss says, the boss does. Doesn't Izumi give a damn about us?! Blazes!

I agree. I've already conveyed our apologies to our distinguished guests.
I've heard what's happening. They say Izumi's gonna hand over the management—so I'm throwing my name in the ring too.
Great idea! Big Sis 'n' Big Bro 'n' me all work here at the hotel already. But Izumi won't even recognize you. You can compete without the boss rumbling us~
But she's always been so feeble. She doesn't stand a chance against those strapping young lads out there!
Who says I'm gonna fight fair... Have you forgotten? I'm the brains behind our star product, spring dust!
Since anything goes in this competition... I'm sure Izumi wouldn't object if I claimed victory with the help of a little medicine...
As long as we're not found out, we can get up to whatever shady business we like here at the hotel.
Well... That really is the only way we're gonna be able to keep the hotel in our hands.
So, we'd better all stick together. Action stations!
We've got to win this thing, or we'll all be out of a job!
